channel.title: Help with stats on my server
channel.description: hello on my server max stats were 100 but i changed back to 99... but for some reason only the combat stats go to 99... like mage goes to 100 and all the other non combat stats go to 100 so how can i make them go to only 99?

item.title: Help with stats on my server
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

post the code u used to change them back to 99 and we may be able to help you

Read full topic
